body_html:
More testing suggest that it's the use of the functional API version of dropout in the forward section of my NN model definition that's the problem. I see that the default training mode is now True in 1.0 and it was False before. I didn't notice the change - though it makes more sense that way.

I understand the issue now - thanks.

body:
More testing suggest that it's the use of the functional API version of dropout in the forward section of my NN model definition that's the problem. I see that the default training mode is now True in 1.0 and it was False before. I didn't notice the change - though it makes more sense that way.

I understand the issue now - thanks.
